items.summary: Update the Message Generator templates to use a harsher, women-centered accountability tone toward the stalker while remaining safety-focused and non-violent/non-harassing, and without making actionable threats or encouraging harm.

Adjust the fixed post-login splash message pool to include additional harsher, accountability-focused motivational lines (still non-violent and non-harassing) while preserving the required exact existing messages already in the list.

Ensure any 'urgent' evidence summary copy remains police-appropriate and can be harsh/accountability-focused without inflammatory labeling; remove or rewrite any wording that characterizes the stalker as a "threat" while keeping urgency and safety emphasis.
